Sequence Information.Peptide Name: BnuTX-I (PLA2, antimicrobial protein; natural AMPs; snake, reptiles; animals; BWQ; unclassified)

Literature Information.Literature: Two short strings of sequences (represented in polyAs) have not been determined.Activity: Active against E.coli ATCC 25922 (20-30% inhibition at 25-100 ug/ml), S.aureus ATCC 29213 (20-30% inhibition 25-100 ug/ml), K. pneumoniae ATCC 13883 (30% inhibition at 100 ug/ml), and P. aeruginosa ATCC 28853 (~60% inhibition at 100 ug/ml). Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Corrêa EA, Kayano AM, Diniz-Sousa R, Setúbal SS, Zanchi FB, Zuliani JP, Matos NB, Almeida JR, Resende LM, Marangoni S, da Silva SL, Soares AM, Calderon LA. 2016
Literature Information.Title: Isolation, Structural and Functional Characterization of a New Lys49 Phospholipase A2 Homologue from Bothrops neuwiedi urutu with Bactericidal Potential.
